EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Whats New 8.4.1 - EMEA/US (excluding DACH) - 2015.08.13.Email - Follow
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1 webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1 webinar! Gerd Weishaar, our VP of Project Management, and Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales and Consulting, introduced and demonstrated several new features from the new Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-whats-new-in-tosca-testsuite-8-4-1-webinar>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis < https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
